subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A California man said Atlanta’s pitching coach, Roger McDowell, spewed homophobic comments and threatened to knock out his teeth with a bat before the Braves played the San Francisco Giants over the weekend.
snippet: A California man said Atlanta’s pitching coach, Roger McDowell, spewed homophobic comments and threatened to knock out his teeth with a bat before the Braves played the San Francisco Giants over the weekend.
